raw: German govt and states agree on way to ease lockdown: document .

raw: BERLIN ( Reuters ) - Germany ’s federal government and 16 states have agreed all shops and some sports can restart under certain conditions , schools will gradually open for all pupils and states will each decide on reopening restaurants , hotels and gyms , a document showed .
